summary: Comprehensive testing of AI Bot Detection System completed. Backend APIs working well (89.7% success rate), frontend UI fully functional with excellent user experience. All major features operational including authentication, domain management, API keys, alerts, traffic logging, and super admin panel.

minor_issues.issue: Requires domain verification before accepting traffic logs
minor_issues.impact: Expected behavior - domains must be verified via DNS/file before logging traffic

ui_bugs.issue: Statistics loading takes 10-15 seconds on first load

accessibility_issues.issue: Missing Description or aria-describedby for DialogContent
affected_selectors: Dialog modals in Domains, API Keys, Alerts

passed_tests: Super admin panel with user monitoring
Bot detection logic with various user agents
action_item_for_main_agent: Consider optimizing dashboard statistics loading performance. The API calls for /api/traffic/stats and /api/domains could be optimized or cached to improve initial load time.
